verses.verse: <S%H7971>"Behold,<s%> I send my <S%H4397>messenger,<s%> and he will <S%H6437>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H113>me;<s%> and the Lord, whom you <S%H1245>seek,<s%> will <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H1964>temple;<s%> and the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> whom you <S%H2655>desire,<s%> <S%H935>behold,<s%> he comes!" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"But who can <S%H3557>endure<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H935>coming?<s%> And who will <S%H5975>stand<s%> when he <S%H7200>appears?<s%> For he is like a <S%H6884>refiner<s%>'s <S%H784>fire,<s%> and like <S%H3526>launderer<s%>'s <S%H1287>soap;<s%>

and he will <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H6884>refiner<s%> and <S%H2891>purifier<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and he will <S%H2891>purify<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H2212>refine<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and they shall <S%H5066>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4503>offerings<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H6149>pleasant<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> and as in <S%H6931>ancient<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

I will come <S%H7126>near<s%> to you to <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and I will be a <S%H4116>swift<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against the <S%H3784>sorcerers,<s%> and against the <S%H5003>adulterers,<s%> and against <S%H8267>the<s%> <S%H7650>perjurers,<s%> and against those who <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H7916>hireling<s%> in his <S%H7939>wages,<s%> the <S%H490>widow,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and who <S%H5186>deprive<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> of <S%H3372>justice,<s%> and don't fear <S%H559>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
"For <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H8138>don't<s%> change; therefore <S%H1121>you,<s%> sons of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> are not <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

From the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> you have turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> from my <S%H2706>ordinances,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H7725>them.<s%> Return to <S%H7725>me,<s%> and I will return to <S%H559>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> "But you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'How shall we return?'

Will a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> Yet you <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H559>me!<s%> But you say, <S%H6906><s%> 'How have we robbed <S%H4643>you?<s%>' In tithes and <S%H8641>offerings.<s%>
You are <S%H779>cursed<s%> with the <S%H3994>curse;<s%> for you <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H1471>me,<s%> even this whole nation.

<S%H935>Bring<s%> the whole <S%H4643>tithe<s%> into the <S%H214>storehouse,<s%> that there may be <S%H2964>food<s%> in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H974>test<s%> me now in <S%H2063>this,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "if I will not <S%H6605>open<s%> you the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and pour you <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> that there shall not be room enough <S%H1767>for.<s%>

I will <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> the <S%H398>devourer<s%> for your <S%H7843>sakes,<s%> and he shall not destroy the <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>ground;<s%> neither shall your <S%H1612>vine<s%> cast its <S%H7921>fruit<s%> before its time in the <S%H7704>field,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
"All <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall call you <S%H833>blessed,<s%> for you will be a <S%H2656>delightful<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
"Your <S%H1697>words<s%> have been <S%H2388>stout<s%> against <S%H559>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> "Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1696><s%> 'What have we spoken against you?'

You have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7723><s%> 'It is vain to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%>' <S%H1215>and<s%> 'What profit is it that we have <S%H8104>followed<s%> his <S%H4931>instructions,<s%> and that we have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6941>mournfully<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies?<s%>

Now we <S%H833>call<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H833>happy;<s%> <S%H6213>yes,<s%> those who work <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> are built <S%H1129>up;<s%> <S%H974>yes,<s%> they tempt <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4422>escape.<s%>'

Then those who <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H7453>another;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7181>listened,<s%> and <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and a <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2146>memory<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3373>him,<s%> for those who feared <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and who <S%H2803>honored<s%> his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

They shall be <S%H559>mine,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "my own <S%H5459>possession<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6213>make,<s%> and I will <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H376>them,<s%> as a man <S%H2550>spares<s%> his own <S%H1121>son<s%> who serves <S%H5647>him.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H7200>discern<s%> between the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> between him who <S%H5647>serves<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and him who <S%H5647>doesn't<s%> serve him.
